sentences.en: A spinning maelstrom of rain swept around the mountain.
sentences.cn: 暴雨如注，打着漩席卷了整座大山。

sentences.en: Grunt : Warchief, our ship sustained heavy damage when we passed through the raging maelstrom. It's unsalvageable.
sentences.cn: 大G:酋长, 我们的船在经过大漩涡时遭到严重的破坏. 看来已经无法修复了.

sentences.en: He insisted that he wanted to fight though, so they sent him into the maelstrom.
sentences.cn: 他仍然坚持要上战场, 于是他们把他送上了前线.

sentences.en: Here chasing down the story got confusing, and stirred up a minor maelstrom in Tokyo.
sentences.cn: 接下来的故事就让人困惑了, 并且在东京也引发了点小风波.

sentences.en: In the center of the maelstrom Morgenes stood, a flask in each outstretched band.
sentences.cn: 在这大旋涡的正中,站着Morgenes, 两只伸出的手中各拿举一只杯子.

sentences.en: Inside, she was a maelstrom of churning emotions.
sentences.cn: 她心中的情感似波涛汹涌，起伏不定。

sentences.en: The boat flipped and hurled its passengers into the maelstrom.
sentences.cn: 这时,小船翻转过来,把上面的乘客都甩进了大漩涡之中.

sentences.en: The canoe was tossed about in the maelstrom.
sentences.cn: 独木舟在旋涡之中摇晃打转.

sentences.en: The maelstrom sucked in the canoe.
This vortex is the Maelstrom , and it occupies the center of the Great Sea.
sentences.cn: 这个漩涡的存在使卡里姆多大陆和东部大陆之间的航船变得困难.

trans.tran_en: dust or water that moves very quickly in circles
